_header: Saint Fronton the holy man though they martyred were
Note: In other MSS St. Fronton is added to the Life of St. Martha: see 3410.
Subjects: saints’ lives; Fronton, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Fronton in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint ffronton þe holi man þo þei martired
                    wereþreched fer in oþer lond & þo he seye
                    þere…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Seint petur þat heuene keye witeþ thorw godes
                    graceGraunte vs þat we mote to heuene come & þere haue a
                    place
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.
